topic: Surprising AI applications in renewable energy
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that unexpected surprises often arise from challenging my own cognitive biases and assumptions. The next step is to actively seek out environments or contexts that differ from my norm, paying attention to how they shift my expectations. I will document these experiences and reflections to identify patterns in what genuinely surprises me, which can then inform future inquiries and exploration.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
